data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Karamay, Xinjiang Uygur, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Karamay, Xinjiang Uygur, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Karamay.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Karamay, Xinjiang Uygur, China so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Karamay, Xinjiang Uygur, China.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Ongkor people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Ongkor people.
Spirit, please give every church in the county of Karamay a passion to plant another simple church.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Karamay to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary:
the county of Karamay, Xinjiang Uygur, China has a population of 400,000.

We estimate Karamay has 30,344 people who might know Jesus, 6,462 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 363,194 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Karamay.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.
